articles.author: Amitabh Sinha
articles.title: European Space Agency announces mission to study Apophis asteroid - The Indian Express
articles.description: Apophis will come within 32,000 km of the Earth in 2029, offering space agencies a rare opportunity to study an asteroid from such close quarters.
articles.content: The European Space Agency (ESA) has announced a mission to study the Apophis asteroid when it passes by Earth at a very close distance in 2029.ESA is the second major space agency, after NASA, to com… [+4131 chars]
